description:
- Removed power chords from the beginning and end verses in the distortion guitar part. Tony plays single notes there. Also changed the positioning
- Added chord names
- Modified how the riff at 48 is played. It should be more accurate now.

description: Error reports are valid now, made bass easier to play.
